get.description: Lists the drafts in the users mailbox.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Maximum number of drafts to return.

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: Page token to retrieve a specific page of results in the list.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The users email address. The special value me can be used to indicate the authenticated user.

post.description: Creates a new draft with the DRAFT label.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The users email address. The special value me can be used to indicate the authenticated user.

post.description: Sends the specified, existing draft to the recipients in the To, Cc, and Bcc headers.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The users email address. The special value me can be used to indicate the authenticated user.

delete.description: Immediately and permanently deletes the specified draft. Does not simply trash it.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the draft to delete.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The users email address. The special value me can be used to indicate the authenticated user.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The format to return the draft in.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the draft to retrieve.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The users email address. The special value me can be used to indicate the authenticated user.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the draft to update.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The users email address. The special value me can be used to indicate the authenticated user.

get.description: Lists the history of all changes to the given mailbox. History results are returned in chronological order (increasing historyId).

parameters.name: labelId
parameters.description: Only return messages with a label matching the ID.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of history records to return.

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: Page token to retrieve a specific page of results in the list.

parameters.name: startHistoryId
parameters.description: Required. Returns history records after the specified startHistoryId. The supplied startHistoryId should be obtained from the historyId of a message, thread, or previous list response. History IDs increase chronologically but are not contiguous with random gaps in between valid IDs. Supplying an invalid or out of date startHistoryId typically returns an HTTP 404 error code. A historyId is typically valid for at least a week, but in some circumstances may be valid for only a few hours. If you rec

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The users email address. The special value me can be used to indicate the authenticated user.

get.description: Lists all labels in the users mailbox.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The users email address. The special value me can be used to indicate the authenticated user.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The users email address. The special value me can be used to indicate the authenticated user.

delete.description: Immediately and permanently deletes the specified label and removes it from any messages and threads that it is applied to.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the label to delete.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The users email address. The special value me can be used to indicate the authenticated user.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the label to retrieve.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The users email address. The special value me can be used to indicate the authenticated user.

patch.description: Updates the specified label. This method supports patch semantics.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the label to update.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The users email address. The special value me can be used to indicate the authenticated user.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the label to update.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The users email address. The special value me can be used to indicate the authenticated user.

get.description: Lists the messages in the users mailbox.

parameters.name: includeSpamTrash
parameters.description: Include messages from SPAM and TRASH in the results.

parameters.name: labelIds
parameters.description: Only return messages with labels that match all of the specified label IDs.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Maximum number of messages to return.

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: Page token to retrieve a specific page of results in the list.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Only return messages matching the specified query. Supports the same query format as the Gmail search box. For example, from:someuser@example.com rfc822msgid: is:unread.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The users email address. The special value me can be used to indicate the authenticated user.

post.description: Directly inserts a message into only this users mailbox similar to IMAP APPEND, bypassing most scanning and classification. Does not send a message.

parameters.name: deleted
parameters.description: Mark the email as permanently deleted (not TRASH) and only visible in Google Apps Vault to a Vault administrator. Only used for Google Apps for Work accounts.

parameters.name: internalDateSource
parameters.description: Source for Gmails internal date of the message.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The users email address. The special value me can be used to indicate the authenticated user.

post.description: Imports a message into only this users mailbox, with standard email delivery scanning and classification similar to receiving via SMTP. Does not send a message.

parameters.name: deleted
parameters.description: Mark the email as permanently deleted (not TRASH) and only visible in Google Apps Vault to a Vault administrator. Only used for Google Apps for Work accounts.

parameters.name: internalDateSource
parameters.description: Source for Gmails internal date of the message.

parameters.name: neverMarkSpam
parameters.description: Ignore the Gmail spam classifier decision and never mark this email as SPAM in the mailbox.

parameters.name: processForCalendar
parameters.description: Process calendar invites in the email and add any extracted meetings to the Google Calendar for this user.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The users email address. The special value me can be used to indicate the authenticated user.

post.description: Sends the specified message to the recipients in the To, Cc, and Bcc headers.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The users email address. The special value me can be used to indicate the authenticated user.

delete.description: Immediately and permanently deletes the specified message. This operation cannot be undone. Prefer messages.trash instead.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the message to delete.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The users email address. The special value me can be used to indicate the authenticated user.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The format to return the message in.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the message to retrieve.

parameters.name: metadataHeaders
parameters.description: When given and format is METADATA, only include headers specified.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The users email address. The special value me can be used to indicate the authenticated user.

post.description: Modifies the labels on the specified message.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the message to modify.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The users email address. The special value me can be used to indicate the authenticated user.

post.description: Moves the specified message to the trash.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the message to Trash.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The users email address. The special value me can be used to indicate the authenticated user.

post.description: Removes the specified message from the trash.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the message to remove from Trash.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The users email address. The special value me can be used to indicate the authenticated user.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the attachment.

parameters.name: messageId
parameters.description: The ID of the message containing the attachment.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The users email address. The special value me can be used to indicate the authenticated user.

get.description: Gets the current users Gmail profile.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The users email address. The special value me can be used to indicate the authenticated user.

get.description: Lists the threads in the users mailbox.

parameters.name: includeSpamTrash
parameters.description: Include threads from SPAM and TRASH in the results.

parameters.name: labelIds
parameters.description: Only return threads with labels that match all of the specified label IDs.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Maximum number of threads to return.

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: Page token to retrieve a specific page of results in the list.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Only return threads matching the specified query. Supports the same query format as the Gmail search box. For example, from:someuser@example.com rfc822msgid: is:unread.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The users email address. The special value me can be used to indicate the authenticated user.

delete.description: Immediately and permanently deletes the specified thread. This operation cannot be undone. Prefer threads.trash instead.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Thread to delete.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The users email address. The special value me can be used to indicate the authenticated user.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The format to return the messages in.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the thread to retrieve.

parameters.name: metadataHeaders
parameters.description: When given and format is METADATA, only include headers specified.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The users email address. The special value me can be used to indicate the authenticated user.

post.description: Modifies the labels applied to the thread. This applies to all messages in the thread.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the thread to modify.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The users email address. The special value me can be used to indicate the authenticated user.

post.description: Moves the specified thread to the trash.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the thread to Trash.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The users email address. The special value me can be used to indicate the authenticated user.

post.description: Removes the specified thread from the trash.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the thread to remove from Trash.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The users email address. The special value me can be used to indicate the authenticated user.
